participant_b.entity_text: Rous sarcoma virus long terminal repeat

verbose_text: For example, Misra et al demonstrated that the conserved amino-terminal region (aa1-20) of HBx has a transrepression function, and Kumar et al demonstrated that a truncated mutant (residues, aa 58-140) of HBx effecientlyh stimulates the Rous sarcoma virus long terminal repeat (RSV-LTR).
evidence: HBx effecientlyh stimulates the Rous sarcoma virus long terminal repeat
